p: The beneficial role of microbially-produced SCFAs in energy regulation of the host, insulin sensitivity and glucose and lipid metabolism has been presented in numerous studies which have been the topic of recent reviews [ 76, 238, 239]. However, certain microbial metabolites have been shown to be detrimental to health and may be significant contributors to the development and progression of metabolic diseases in the host [ 97]. Dietary-derived microbial metabolites are of particular interest given that dietary modulation and probiotic and prebiotic inventions offer viable routes to alter microbial metabolite signatures.
